nodes.text: I see that Herr Kyro has not yet graced us with his presence. Herr Sosi, could you enlighten us as to his absence?
Um.. I didn't see him this morning. He was gone before I awoke.
Indeed? Let us hope there is nothing about which to be concerned.
Maybe he didn't get his homework done and was afraid to admit it.
Ah yes, the homework assignment. Let us see how well you all did upon the topic of Friendship and Cooperation...
Herr Kent, you wrote a fine essay. However, I suggest that you might want to put your words into actions by going out of your way to make friends and work with others.
Yes, sir.
Herr Sosi, a good essay, as usual. It is amazing how much you and Herr Kyro write with such a similar voice.
Great minds think alike, Master.
Little minds think like someone else...
Ah, yes, Fräulein MacMichael, if you had spent a little more time writing your essay on cooperation with others rather than antagonizing others, you would have earned a better grade on it.
Fräulein Esme, your grammar and writing skills have improved greatly over this semester. I congratulate you.
Thank you, sir.
I am also impressed with your essay, Herr O'Conner. You continue to surprise me.

options.text: Answer Politely to Please Master von Urwald

nodes.text: Thank you, sir. I'll do what I can to impress and please you.

options.text: Answer Cleverly to Amuse Master von Urwald

nodes.text: With me, you should always expect the unexpected.
For the essay, I just used Herr Sosi as an example of how to use friends to get work done. Shame he doesn't have more friends to use.
As for Herr O'Conner, you turned in an acceptable but unimaginative essay which would have been greatly improved had you but put in a little more effort.

options.text: Answer Politely to Please Master von Urwald

nodes.text: I'll keep your advice in mind for the next essay, sir.

options.text: Answer Cleverly to Impress Master von Urwald

nodes.text: I'm sorry, sir, but I thought it was better to spend my time cooperating with my friends on risky activities rather than by writing an essay about it.

options.text: Answer Snarkily to Defend Your Behavior

nodes.text: The essay was on "Risk and Rewards", wasn't it? Since this is a Rogue Class and not English Lit 101, I thought I'd risk your wrath and practice my Rogue Skills rather than waste my time writing an essay.
Herr O'Conner, your essay was inarticulate, incomprehensible, and masked by its illegibility. Do you have anything to say about it?
I'm sorry sir. I'll work harder next time.

I was so busy helping others with their work that I was exhausted when I got back to my bedroom. I was too tired to think, but I knew that it was better to write anything rather than miss this assignment, sir.
I'm a Rogue. I got better things to do than write pointless essays.
Herr O'Conner, I don't see your essay. Is there a reason you didn't see fit to turn one in?
I'm sorry, sir. I got so caught up practicing my Rogue skills yesterday that I completely forgot about the assignment.
I suggest that you should take class assigments as seriously as you take your practice.
I spent hours working on the essay yesterday, but then my pencil broke just as I was finishing up. So I had to go to the store to get another one.

Gregor was hungry, so he asked if I would do him a favor and catch him some Drats. Since the essay was about friends and cooperation, I thought it would be a good idea to put the lesson into practice.
So I went into the wine cellar and found a nest. I was soon surrounded by a pack of Drats, so I pulled out a trap from my backpack. To my horror, my essay fell out of my pack and was eaten by a Drat.
You know how it is. Essay comes, essay goes.
Your audacity is impressive, Herr O'Conner.
I've risked my life by dodging Drats, evading Pirates, ganking Gogs, and exploring the sea caves. I figured that I could survive missing an assignment.
You figured incorrectly, Herr O'Conner. Take your class assignments more seriously from now on - or I shall add to your demerits collection.
Tomorrow's lesson will be on Magic. I trust I will see all of you then. Guten Tag.
